mapper.insert: insert into transport( employeeID, workMonth, startDate, startStation, endStation, transportFacility, transportExpense, midStation1, transportFacility1, midStation2, midStation3, transport, businessTrip, status, insertDate ) values ( #{employeeID}, #{workMonth}, #{startDate}, #{startStation}, #{endStation}, #{transportFacility}, #{transportExpense}, #{midStation1}, #{transportFacility1}, #{midStation2}, #{midStation3}, #{transport}, #{businessTrip}, '0', date_format(now(),'%Y%m%d') )
mapper.select: select t.workMonth, t.startDate, t.startStation, t.endStation, t.transportFacility, t.transportExpense, t.midStation1, t.transportFacility1, t.midStation2, t.midStation3, t.transport, t.businessTrip from ems.transport t where t.employeeID = #{employeeID} order by t.workMonth desc limit 1
